mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS( MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_CALL, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_ADDR, MEM_TYPE, MEM_DOG_NAME, MEM_DOG_NUM, MEM_BR_IDX, MEM_BR_NAME, MEM_DOG_WEIGHT, MEM_DOG_MBTI, MEM_DOG_ETC, MEM_REG_DATE, MEM_MOD_DATE, MEM_DEL_GB) VALUES( #{MEM_ID}, #{MEM_PW}, #{MEM_CALL}, #{MEM_EMAIL}, #{MEM_ADDR}, 1, #{MEM_DOG_NAME}, #{MEM_DOG_NUM}, #{KINDOFDOG}, #{MEM_BR_NAME}, #{MEM_DOG_WEIGHT}, null, #{MEM_DOG_ETC}, sysdate, sysdate, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}
